• Deals extra damage to Crystalline creatures.
entries.@pa73_description:
Experimental ammo filled with Selenium particles.

• Deals extra damage to Crystalline creatures.
entries.@pa74_description:
Reduces footstep noise while moving.

• Footstep sound volume is reduced by 80% after a precision kill for 10 seconds.
entries.@pa81_description:
Experimental ammo filled with Selenium particles.

• Deals extra damage to Crystalline creatures.
entries.@pa82_description:
Adjustable lower receiver for 9 mm mags.

• Refills 25 ammo upon kill.
entries.@rds22_description:
Ultra-zoom red dot sight.

• 1.75x magnification.
• 10% faster aiming down sights.
• 5% increased effective range.

• 1.2x magnification.
• 15% faster aiming down sights.
• 5% increased effective range while aiming.
entries.@rds21_description:
Red dot sight used by special forces.

• 1.2x magnification.
• 10% increased movement speed in ADS.
entries.@sp57_description:
Limited-edition 3D-printed titanium muzzle brake.

• 10% improved weapon stability during continuous shooting.
entries.@gp43_description:
3D-printed carbon grip, which allows for more comfortable weapon handling.

• 10% increased hip fire accuracy for the first 4 rounds in a magazine.

entries.gp35_description:
Ergonomic right-handed grip.

• 15% increased hip fire accuracy while sliding.
entries.@pa83_description:
Special barrel retrofit.

• Refills 10 rounds in magazine upon a slide kill.
entries.@pa84_description:
Experimental barrel retrofit.

• Scoring a multikill increases weapon aiming speed by 30%, decreases hip spread by 50% and reduces recoil by 30% for 10 seconds.
entries.@pa85_description:
Pellets filled with tungsten carbide.

• Deal extra damage to Strafers.
entries.@sl12_description:
Next-gen silencer for sniper rifles.

• Reduced shot loudness.
• Undetectable by enemy radar while shooting.
• Decreases enemy aggression in Coop.
